title: The Dead Signal
description: A merchant in Tinker's Alley sold you a 'Broken Radio Receiver' for cheap. Late at night, it suddenly turns on, broadcasting a repeating sequence of numbers in a dead language.

turns.narrative: You bring the radio to Jaxx, the best tinkerer in the Ward. He turns pale upon hearing the numbers. 'That's the Old Imperial military code. But there hasn't been an Empire for three hundred years.'
turns.choice_a: Ask him to boost the signal to trace it
turns.consequence_a: He connects it to his shop's main antenna. The numbers grow deafeningly loud, shattering several glass tubes in his shop.
turns.consequence_b: He stammers out the translation: 'Awakening protocol... Subject 7... Hunger...'

turns.narrative: As the signal clarifies, a horde of minor Vermin (rats) suddenly swarm the shop, seemingly agitated by the frequency.
turns.consequence_a: You crush the rats, protecting Jaxx and the equipment.
turns.choice_b: Smash the radio to stop the signal
turns.consequence_b: The radio breaks, the rats immediately scatter. Jaxx is furious you broke his tech, but the immediate threat is gone.

signal_traced.description: You successfully traced the signal's origin down into the Bio-Ward.

radio_smashed.description: You smashed the radio, but memorized the frequency baseline.

conclusion: You successfully traced the signal's origin down into the Bio-Ward.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
